subject: Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: A youth baseball team from Saudi Arabia received the berth to the Little League World Series that was lost by the squad from Uganda that was denied visas because of discrepancies over players’ ages and dates of birth.
snippet: A youth baseball team from Saudi Arabia received the berth to the Little League World Series that was lost by the squad from Uganda that was denied visas because of discrepancies over players’ ages and dates of birth.
